Formularios de Clientes¶

class clientes.forms.ClienteForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)¶

property media¶

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.
